enhanced_by.reason: The clean method relies on parsing the input HTML fragment before cleaning it, making parseBodyFragment a necessary precursor.
The Cleaner instance is required to clean the parsed document, indicating a strong dependency on its initialization.
The clean method performs a similar operation to the Cleaner's clean method, making it a suitable candidate for asserting the outcome of the clean method.
Both methods involve validating or cleaning HTML content, making isValidBodyHtml a relevant method for asserting the validity of the cleaned HTML.
